import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProjectsService } from '../../Services/projects.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-all-employees-of-project', templateUrl: './all-employees-of-project.component.html', styleUrls: ['./all-employees-of-project.component.css'] }) export class AllEmployeesOfProjectComponent implements OnInit{ projectId:number=5; assignedEmployees:any[]=[]; constructor(private service:ProjectsService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getAssignedEmployeesOfProject(this.projectId).subscribe((res)=>{ this.assignedEmployees=res; console.log(res); }) } }
